dialog-mage01_1.name: Mage 01
messages:
I test the CHECK_ENTITY_NAME and
SET_ENTITY_NAME actions.
Set my name to 'Mage 00'
and then talk to me again.

dialog-mage01_2.name: Mage 00
messages:
Good work, you set my name to 'Mage 00'!
Now I should set my name back to 'Mage 01'
when you close this dialog.

dialog-mage02_1.name: Mage 02
messages:
I test the CHECK_ENTITY_X and
CHECK_ENTITY_Y actions. Set my
X to 193 and my Y to 97
and then talk to me again.

dialog-mage02_2.name: Mage 02
messages:
Good work, you set my X to 193 & my Y to 97!
I should set X back to 192 and Y back to 96
when you close this dialog.

dialog-mage03_1.name: Mage 03
messages:
I test the CHECK_ENTITY_INTERACT_SCRIPT and
CHECK_ENTITY_TICK_SCRIPT actions. Set the
tick or interact scripts for yourself to
anything other than their current value.

When you talk to me again, I should know
if you changed them and will say
something new.

dialog-mage03_2.name: Mage 03
messages:
Looks like you updated your own
onTick Script or onInteract Script.
They should be reset to their original
values when you close this dialog.
